definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Endangered. Bwindi Impenetrable Forest, Uganda. [High resolution]
sentences.chinese: 濒危。乌干达，布温迪森林公园

sentences.english: This is about 17 kilometers from the Uganda border.
sentences.chinese: 这里离乌干达边境大约17公里远。

sentences.english: In 2001 it was found in Uganda.
The Anti-Homosexuality Bill is yet to be formally debated by the Ugandan parliament.
sentences.chinese: 反同性恋者比尔尚未在乌干达会议上进行正式辩论。

sentences.english: The containment and control measures that have been implemented by the MoH to date are in accordance with international best practice.
sentences.chinese: 乌干达卫生部迄今采取的控制措施符合国际最佳做法。

sentences.english: But Uganda seems to be on the front lines of this battle.
sentences.chinese: 但是乌干达好像处于这场战斗的前线。

sentences.english: Uganda's MSI loan uses a different approach.
sentences.chinese: 乌干达的MSI贷款使用了一种不同的方法。

sentences.english: Kato was an activist with the group Sexual Minorities Uganda.
sentences.chinese: 卡托是“乌干达性少数派”组织的一名活动人士。

sentences.english: Schmierer, who added that in Uganda he had focused on parenting skills.
sentences.chinese: 他补充道他在乌干达主要讲解的是家教技巧。
乌干达人赞同这一观点。

sentences.english: In Uganda Ms Counihan went for the false positives.
sentences.chinese: 在乌干达，康尼汉女士主攻的是假阳性问题。

sentences.english: The Lord's Resistance Army in Uganda is a perfect example.
sentences.chinese: 乌干达的圣主抵抗军就是一个完美的例子。

sentences.english: Kingfishers hunting at Queen Elizabeth National Park, Uganda.
sentences.chinese: 翠鸟猎食在王后伊丽莎白国家公园，乌干达。

sentences.english: In Africa the same thing is true, as in Uganda and Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 在非洲也有同样的情况，例如乌干达和肯尼亚。

sentences.english: Two cases of Marburg virus infection have recently been reported in Uganda.
sentences.chinese: 乌干达最近报告了两起马尔堡病毒感染病例。

sentences.english: Many Childern were Killed in Uganda to Sacrifice the God.
sentences.chinese: 乌干达发生用儿童祭祀神明事件。

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
